column4: is there a free program on windows i can use to watch tv? (if i have a card witha  coax slot)?
errm, this isnt #windows  :)
sorry
can you help me with ubuntu then?
playing TV on ubntu?
well i want to use mythtv on ubuntu
hmm -- are you sure your link's a PPPoE link?
not sure what that even means--i'm using dsl (SBCIS)
do you use a router or cable modem ??
and i have like a dsl modem; and i have to use a username and passwrod for it
yea, thats probably PPPoE
Do you know how I can fix that error?
so its a phone line -- not cable eh?? that might be PPPoA rather than PPPoE
yikes, I don't know--I don't plug the phone line into my computer, but into the 'box', and form that an eternet to my computer
PPPoE sounds familiar though
errm, how does the modem connect to computer?
you didnt tell me how modem hooks upto computer eh
oh sorry, didn't see that. by ethernet
ok, errm, do you know the make and model # of the modem? maybe someone else out there has figured out how to use it with linux
Yeah, it's a Westell WireSpeed, I use it for SBCIS (Pacbell dsl)
do you have the specific model # ??
it's a relaly long model number
-- the first 2 parts ought to do like -- A90-210030
